Chinese.name: CKafka数据加载到CDW
Chinese.description: 本示例会探测CKafka，如果有数据可以消费，会将其写入云数据仓库CDW。

English.name: CkafkaLoadToCDWByTrigger
English.description: This example consumes CKafka data by CKafka trigger, then write the data to CDW.
English.attention: When using this sample code, you need to pass the environment variables of related functions.
